p: The PDB files were obtained from the RCSB Protein Data Bank ( https://www.rcsb.org/). Position data were found using ATOM header: i.e., positions at the alpha carbon of amino acids were connected to draw the structure and were then aligned using PCA. The HTML5 output was generated using the writeWebGL function of the rgl package of R ( https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/rgl/vignettes/rgl.html).
